property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Give the Runner 2 tags.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Looking out for your interests since 1984.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Recurring Credits] Use this credit during traces. Gain 1 [Credits] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1 [Memory Unit], +1 [Link]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Archaic but reliable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 [Credits] to break 1 additional subroutine on that ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and automatic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The key to the future lies in the past.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. [Click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 net damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Fetal AI from Archives. As an additional cost to steal Fetal AI, the Runner must pay 2 [Credits]

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash up to 2 resources.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Replicating Perfection

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Replicating Perfection

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 16 [Credits] from the bank on Liberated Account when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Liberated Account, trash it. [Click]: Take 4 [Credits] from Liberated Account.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn. Trace2 - If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Expose up to 2 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[Subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Sherlock 1.0. [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. [Subroutine] Trace4 - If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 4||Move Target Program to the top of its owner's Stack (Only use this ability if the previous trace succeeded)

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine. 1 [Credits]: +1 strength. Whenever you use Snowball to break a subroutine, it has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" - Chaos Theory

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break barrier subroutine and gain +1 strength until the end of this run.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: Move up to 2 advancement tokens from a card to another installed card that can be advanced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Smoke and mirrors optional.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may pay X [Credits] to force the Corp to lose up to X [Credits], then take 1 tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
